text:
<!everyone> happy friday everyone!
we had two cool events this week:
• first, <@U019F15SA7Q> walked us through how to update old content. this was a cool working session where attendees walked away with a list of articles and a plan for refreshing them. here's the recording → <https://superpath.co/blog/content-refreshing-workshop-hosted-by-megan-mahoney>
• next, we talked web3 in an AMA with <@U01AHL8AGBB>. <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/C014P2BJLER/p1648141229273489|you can still see that in slack> (and we'll have a blog post recap next week)
okay, onto jobs!
---
:tv: = includes a video Q&A
:zap:️ = new this week
---
:star:*️ featured full-time roles:*
---

:v: jimmy
